name: Barbara & Gordon
description:
Barbara is stuck in a dark, cold maze and she needs your help to find an escape. Luckily, Barbara met a friendly bat called Gordon who grabbed a lantern and he follows Barbara to light up the maze. Guide Barbara to find the exit and go home.

This game was built in a weekend at Global Game Jam 2017 in Belfast, UK.
